channel.title: Minor post game bug
channel.description:
#### What happened? Nothing gamebreaking. I got DCd from a game and reconnected. At the end of the game I noticed it said I started as assassin and ended as assasin. I actually started as a drunk. But when i disconnected and reconnected that was post conversion.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Should have said that I started as a drunk
#### Steps to reproduce: haven't. Not trying to purposely disconnect.
#### Comments: not a terribly big deal but worth pointing out I think. The post game analysis shows your starting role as whatever your role was when you recconected.

item.title: Minor post game bug

item.description:
What happened?
